attributes.action: Keep Britain Out of War with Iran — No UK Role in Escalating Conflict
attributes.additional_details: US forces have already bombed Iranian nuclear facilities, raising the real risk of a wider regional war. Iran has promised to respond, and there is serious concern the UK could be drawn into a devastating conflict that threatens civilian lives and global stability.
attributes.background:
We call on the UK Government to take a clear and immediate position that it will not participate in any military action related to the conflict between the US, Israel and Iran.

Commit to pursuing a diplomatic response aimed at de-escalation and regional stability.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Commit to no military involvement in attacks on Iran
